member.name: T:Fast.UndoRedo.Core.Tests.ActionAndReflectionTests
member.summary: Tests covering reflection helpers and property-action behaviour used by the core.

member.summary: Verifies that a setter delegate can be created and applied to set a property value.

member.summary: Verifies that read-only properties yield a null setter.

member.summary: Verifies that private setters can be accessed via reflection helper.

member.summary: Validates constructor argument checks for PropertyChangeAction.

member.name: M:Fast.UndoRedo.Core.Tests.ActionAndReflectionTests.ActionFactory_CreatesPropertyAction_AndApplies
member.summary: Ensures ActionFactory creates a working property-change action from reflection-based setter.

member.summary: Full end-to-end scenario: attach view model and collection, perform changes and verify undo/redo restores state.

member.name: T:Fast.UndoRedo.Core.Tests.MemoryLeakTests
member.summary: Tests ensuring tracked objects are unregistered correctly and can be garbage-collected.

member.name: M:Fast.UndoRedo.Core.Tests.MemoryLeakTests.Register_Unregister_AllowsGarbageCollection_ForTrackedObject
member.summary: Verifies that registering and then unregistering an object allows it to be collected by the GC.

member.name: M:Fast.UndoRedo.Core.Tests.MemoryLeakTests.Register_MultipleThreads_NoRaceOnCollectionSnapshots
member.summary: Verifies there are no race conditions when registering/unregistering from multiple threads and taking collection snapshots.

member.summary: Stress tests related to memory and repeated register/unregister operations.

member.name: M:Fast.UndoRedo.Core.Tests.MemoryStressTests.RegisterUnregister_LargeLoop_DoesNotLeak
member.summary: Long running stress test that verifies many register/unregister cycles do not leak memory. Skipped by default.
